data.name: Hero Lilith - Sponsor Package
data.detailed_description:
The content includes school uniforms and morning star hammer, which can be picked up in the treasure chest on the 2nd floor of the hero's house after purchase.

Note: If you are a fundraising sponsor, you will get it for free!
data.about_the_game:
The content includes school uniforms and morning star hammer, which can be picked up in the treasure chest on the 2nd floor of the hero's house after purchase.

Note: If you are a fundraising sponsor, you will get it for free!
data.short_description: The content includes school uniforms and morning star hammer, which can be picked up in the treasure chest on the 2nd floor of the hero's house after purchase. Note: If you are a fundraising sponsor, you will get it for free!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 3.20GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560 Ti 或 AMD Radeon™ R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 3770 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060（VRAM 3GB) 或 AMD Radeon™ RX 580 (VRAM 4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
